post_title: FS- 1909 Piedmont Nap Lajoie “Throwing”  SGC 7 NM
post_content:
For sale is a t206 Nap Lajoie “Throwing” Piedmont Back —SGC graded 7 Near Mint.

As of now it’s the highest graded for the pose with a piedmont back with only  1 equal..Absolutely stunning copy in hand. 


Asking $14,500.00 obo. 

PM with inquiries, and include your email if you need more scans or need to discuss more.


-Connor
What a beautiful card.  Good luck with the sale.
If we had a Like button mine would be worn out.  That card is beautiful. GLWS!
Stuff like this makes me want to liquidate my collection and start fresh. Beautiful card and best of luck with the sale.
